TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureInfoConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換物件與字串。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立的執行個體類別。You should never create an instance of the class. 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換類型的變數為字串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 它會先建構使用希臘文的文化特性 （由"el"） 的變數並將它轉換為字串"希臘文 」。First it constructs a variable using the Greek culture (represented by "el") and converts it to the string "Greek". 然後它會轉換成字串"俄文" "ru 」 表示法。Then it converts the string "Russian" to the representation "ru". [!code-cpp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#8)]

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a using the specified context.

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換物件與字串。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 不完整清單時，會有其他有效值除了標準的清單值提供。When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.
